additional_notes: The design incorporates traditional Kerala 'Nalukettu' courtyard concept as a central open space connecting both levels, ensuring ample natural light and air circulation. Built-in service areas and multi-use spaces are optimized to maximize functionality within the 60x90 feet plot while respecting budget constraints. Vastu guidelines have been considered for spatial orientation, room placements, and openings.
